dependency.name: curl
dependency.message: PHP curl extension is required by the Decibel update process.

dependency.name: gd
dependency.message: PHP gd extension is required to allow cropping and resizing of images.

dependency.name: intl
dependency.message: PHP intl extension is required to provide full regional and language support.

dependency.name: Phar
dependency.message: PHP phar extension must be available to enable backup and appliction update functionality within Decibel.

dependency.name: APC,eAccelerator,XCache
dependency.message: An op-code cache is highly recommended when running Decibel in a production environment. Decibel has been tested using eAccelerator, XCache and APC.

dependency.name: memcache
dependency.message: Memcache (or an equivalent shared memory cache) is highly recommended when running Decibel in a production environment.

dependency.name: phar.readonly
dependency.message: PHP phar.readonly option must be set to 'Off' to enable backup and packaging functionality within Decibel.

dependency.name: session.auto_start
dependency.message: PHP session.auto_start option must be set to 'Off' for a website to be compliant with EU Cookie laws.

dependency.name: display_startup_errors
dependency.message: PHP display_startup_errors option should be set to 'Off' when running Decibel in Production mode

release.change: Error and debug messages contain HTML tags when reported during CLI execution
Utilisation index contains invalid referential integrity relationships between DChildObject models and their parents
app\decibel\utility\DString::stripHtml() function does not remove object or iframe tags
Re-wrote the authorisation manager to introduce a modular authorisation system based on Identification, Authentication and Post-login Tasks
Deprecated the app\decibel\model\field\DRelationalField::maintainIntegrity parameter in favour of app\decibel\model\field\DRelationalField::relationalIntegrity
Added the app\decibel\model\DLightModel class for very large data sets
Added the app\decibel\router\DRouter::$router parameter allowing access to the router processing the current request
Added the $includeAll parameter to control whether unneccessary pagination controls are included in the pagination
Added the app\decibel\http\request\DRequest::isRpc() function to determine if the current request was invoked by a remote procedure call
Added the app\decibel\utility\DResult::hasMessages() function to determine if a result has any messages
Added the app\decibel\utility\DSession::get() function to retrieve a session variable
Scripts and stylesheets named with a ".min.xxx" extension are now ignored by the minifier
Forced logins will not be completed successfully if a user account has one or more active post-login tasks.
The name of the user that created and/or the name of the user that updated publishable data is not longer included in the search index by default
Improved debugging output when running Decibel as on CLI
Added minLinks and maxLinks parameters to control minimum and maximum available selections
Navigation preview images and descriptions can now be added to themes.

Theme images referenced within bundled stylesheets are now automatically embedded within the style sheet as base 64 encoded data where they are smaller than 1024 bytes. This significantly reduces the number of requests required to render a page.
Added the Developer Health Check to automatically test for common developer errors.
Added the app\decibel\model\DBaseModel::generateRandomModels() function to allow developers to quickly generate randomised content for testing purposes.
Added support for the XCache and APC op-code caches to the Health Check.
Available languages are not correctly saved for some multi-lingual models with language inheritance enabled.
Added the app\decibel\utility\DUtilityData::fromArray() function to allow creation of a DUtilityData object from an array.
Added the app\decibel\model\search\DSearchCondition class allowing the creation of custom search methods while using the app\decibel\model\DModelSearch class.
Added the app\decibel\model\search\DOrCondition class allowing the use of OR searches within the app\decibel\model\DModelSearch class.
Added the app\decibel\utility\DFileUpload::copyTo() function to copy an uploaded file.
HTML tidying no longer occurs on administration pages, resulting in a small performance improvement.
Added the app\decibel\configuration\DOnConfigurationChange event to allow changes to be made following an update to configuration options.
Improved the performance of the model search classes in certain situations.
Added an Event Manager Health Check to determine whether the Event Manager is functioning correctly.
Requesting a multi-lingual text value without a language code favours the default language of the model over the current language.
Added CRC32 checksums to installer packages.
Various performance improvements when loading from an empty cache.
Incorrect caching of model search results can result in a notice error in some situations.
Added buffering to the caching system to avoid repetitive cache clearing commands within a transactional operation.
Database caching is now optional and it is recommended that this is disabled on any production site with a properly tuned shared memory cache.
Improved the app\decibel\model\DModel::free() method.
Language options are not always syncronised with the available languages of the model instance being edited.
Avaliable languages can now be selected on the first step of model instance creation.
Menu items with external URLs do not link correctly.
Checksum generation can cause out of memory errors when adding large files to packages or backups.
Added the Performance Log to assist with debugging performance issues on live websites.
Added the app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch::getAggregateFields() method to return aggregated field data from model searches.
Rewrote the shared memory caching system to employ an invalidation technique instead of direct key removal. This allows much quicker clearing of cache segments and is less prone to errors.
Model searches can now filter based on the value of a field in a model linked to the searched model.
Added the Application Mode health check.

Added the app\decibel\debug\DException::regenerateBacktrace() function to allow caught exceptions to appear to have been generated in the location they were caught. This is useful to mask private functions from exception messages where this information is not useful for debugging purposes.
The app\decibel\application\DDependencyHealthCheck now confirms that all files in the Decibel installation directory are owned by the correct user.
Added the app\decibel\asset\DStorageHealthCheck to check available storage space.
Added the app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch::getField() to return a non- multi-dimensional array containing the value of one field only.
Added the app\decibel\model\DAbstractModelInstantiationException exception to provide a more informative error message when incorrectly instantiating an abstract model.
Rich text in a child object is incorrect escaped when edited and re-saved.

Added stricter validation for field values within the app\decibel\model\field\DField::serialize() method. An app\decibel\model\debug\DInvalidFieldValueException will now be thrown where invalid data is provided.
Added the app\decibel\model\search\DSortCriteria to allow additional control over sorting results from the app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch class.
Moved the app\decibel\test\DTestCase class from the Decibel Toolkit into the framework to allow tighter testing integration in future.
Added the app\decibel\mail\DEmail fluent interface for creating and sending e-mail.
Added the app\decibel\mail\DMailServer dependency injection container to allow configurable e-mail sending.
Added the app\decibel\mail\DDebugMailServer mail server to allow easy debugging of mail sending functionality where no SMTP server exists or the developer wishes to ensure that no real mail is sent.
Updated minimum recommended PHP version to 5.3.15
Fixed potential XSS attack when account confirmation is enabled.
The Ctrl-S shortcut can now be used to save data when editing in the administration console.
Unable to generate update packages for custom Apps in some situations.
Can't download packages through the Update screen in Internet Explorer.
Session save path is based on owner of the app\decibel\utility\DSession file, not the process owner.
Sender is incorrectly interpreted by app\decibel\mail\DEmail in some situations.
Added more meaningful error message when accessing invalid remote procedures in Debug mode.
An exception is now thrown when recursive save actions are detected.
Added the app\decibel\server\DServer::getHostName() method to retrieve the server's host name.
Embedded video breaks W3C compatibility of generated HTML 5 pages.
PHP mail function used by app\decibel\mail\DDefaultMailServer fails when user's first or last name is a valid e-mail address.
Update process unable to clear cache when run over an SSL connection.
Added the app\decibel\task\DScheduledTask::canRunInTestMode() method to specify whether a scheduled task can be executed in Test mode.
Added the app\decibel\rpc\DRemoteProcedureCall class to simplify execution of remote procedures on remote Decibel servers.
Added the app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch::export() method to allow exporting of model search results to CSV or other formats.
Added audit logging for scheduled task execution.
Added the app\decibel\task\DQueue and app\decibel\task\DQueueableTask classes to allow task queueing.
Query execution details are now shown when debugging app\decibel\database\DQuery objects.
Added the app\decibel\utility\DString::implode() function for advanced string implosion.
Added database structure diffing for abstract model tables.
Added the "app\decibel\maintenance-Cache" privilege.
Added the app\decibel\rpc\DRemoteProcedureCall::setParameters() method to allow the assignment of multiple parameters to a remote procedure call.
Added the app\decibel\process\DShell class to simplify execution of shell processes.
Significantly improved the performance model searches that sort by or return values for fields of type app\decibel\model\field\DLinkedObjectField.
Database caching is now disabled by default on new installations.
The IP Address Manager can bnow be used to define known and secure IP addresses, as well as to block IP addresses from accessing Decibel.
Saving login sessions using browser cookies is now supported by the default Decibel authentication functionality.
Added the app\decibel\process\DShell::setTimeout() method to allow timing out of executed processes.
The installer now tests that Apache mod_rewrite is enabled.
App code is now tested for against Decibel quality standards before package generation.
Added the DECIBEL_CORE_SESSIONDOMAIN configuration option allowing configuration of the domain on which the session cookie will be set for this installation.
Added the status field to the app\decibel\authorise\DUser model to provide a readable description of a user's account status.
An instance of the app\decibel\application\DConfigurationManager class is now exposed to all views in the variable {$configurationManager}
A division by zero error is produced by app\decibel\utility\DPagination::__construct() where the $pageSize parameter is invalid.
Theme cache must be manually cleared after some updates to re-generate modified views.
A HTTP 406 response is now generated by app\decibel\http\request\DRequest on the detection of cross-site scripting attacks.
Some tasks do not execute when scheduled.
Custom fields assigned to abstract models are not updated in the database.
A warning error is triggered by app\decibel\rpc\DRemoteProcedure::authorise() if null is passed as the second parameter.
The internal available languages cache is not cleared for models when available languages are changed.
Added an initial PHP minimum version to the installer.
Unable to sort using the string value of an app\decibel\model\field\DLinkedObjectField within an app\decibel\model\DModelSearch.
Unable to save app\decibel\model\DChild objects when edited through the administration interface.
Added the app\decibel\model\field\DField::isInherited() method to determine if a field has been inherited from a parent model.
Added the app\decibel\ssl namespace including classes to generate public/private key pairs and certificate signing requests.
Values provided for read-only fields are now ignored by app\decibel\model\DBaseModel::mergeRequestData().
It is now no longer required to provide an edit template for models.
Added the DECIBEL_CORE_BLOCKIPS configuration option to determine whether Decibel should check for IP addresses marked as blocked in the IP Address Manager.
The task scheduler health check now identifies individual scheduled tasks that have not executed on schdule.
Improved performance of cached page loads for guest users.
Read-only parameters are overriden by app\decibel\model\DBaseModel::mergeRequestData()
Domain names containing a space before a dot (.) are incorrectly validated by app\decibel\validator\DUrlValidator
Incorrect mime types are used for some font formats.
Saved login cookie created irrespective of authorisation settings in some situations.
Deprecated method app\decibel\email\DEmail::send() throws an error when providing file attachments.
Validation of domains by app\decibel\validator\DUrlValidator does not support UTF-8 alpha-numeric characeters.
Added the ability to define messages for exceptions as multi-lingual labels.
Added the app\decibel\model\search\DChildFieldCondition search type to allow searching on fields within child objects of an object.
Usage history does not correctly report user information where the user has been deleted.
Decibel attempts to set cookie headers when running on CLI if saved logins are enabled.
Attachments on e-mails sent be app\decibel\mail\DEmail cannot be viewed on Microsoft Outlook email clients if the filename contains UTF-8 characters.
Exceptions thrown during remote procedure execution when in debug mode are not returned in JSON encoded format.
Data export from administration screens fails without warning if maximum field count is exceeded.
The return contract of app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch::get*() methods is broken when a app\decibel\utility\DPagnation object is returned as ArrayAccess is not implemented.
Added the app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch::enableCaching() method to allow control over whether model search results will be cached.
Added the $returnType parameter to the app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch::includeField() method allowing control over individual field return types.
Added the $alias parameter to the app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch::includeField() method allowing aliasing of returned fields.
Added the app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch::includeAggregateField() method allowing field values to be returned following the application of SQL aggregate functions.
Added the app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch::includeLinkedField() method allowing fields from linked objects to be returned in model search results.
The cyclomatic complexity of methods within custom Apps is now tested upon package generation and highly complex methods flagged for improvement.
Added the DECIBEL_UPDATE_BLOCKWAITTIME and DECIBEL_UPDATE_BLOCKMESSAGE configuration options to allow customisation of the update block.
Improved JOIN optimisation within app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch.
Assigning a app\decibel\model\DLightModel to a app\decibel\model\field\DLinkedObjectField triggers a app\decibel\model\debug\DInvalidFieldValueException when serializing data in strict mode.
Debugging a app\decibel\controller\DPath object can result in an out of memory error in some scenarios.
Added the app\decibel\hosting\DWebServer dependency injection container to allow support of additional HTTP servers.
Added support for running Decibel through NGINX through the app\decibel\hosting\DNginx class.
Added the app\decibel\utility\DSession::isNewSession() method to check whether the current request is the first request in a session.
Joins are incorrectly ordered when performing some linked field searches on app\decibel\audit\DAuditRecord models.
Unqiue index validation can fail when data from a model that has been uninstalled remains present in the database.
Added the app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch::sortByLinkedField() method allowing results to be sorted based on the value of fields within linked objects.
Added the app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch::addSortCriteria() method to allow the application of any custom search criteria to a model search.
Added the app\decibel\process\DShell::processOutput() to allow execution of one or more callback functions on the output of a shell command.
Debugged SQL queries are now formatted.
Added the Forbidden Request Audit Log to track requests blocked by the WAF, such as cross-site scripting attacks.
Debug Console does not show if Production Mode is changed to Debug Mode during application execution.
Scheduled tasks are now automatically cancelled and rescheduled if the parent cron process fails.
app\decibel\process::findPidWindows() writes to stderr when the requested process ID does not exist.
app\decibel\process::findPidWindows() writes to stderr when the requested process ID does not exist.
Removed app\decibel\authorise\DGuestUser-Edit privilege as this model cannot be modified.
An HTTP 500 status code is now returned on ocurrence of a PHP fatal error.
OPTIONS requests are now allowed by default in the generated .nginx configuration.
Field identifiers can now begin with a numeric character.
Joins added to a model search by search conditions are not removed when cloning the search.
Sites with forced HTTPS use HTTP links in navigations.
Values for some fields are not correctly cast when retrieved from the database.
Current language is not persisted to remote procedures when no session has been started.
Unable to set a linked field to empty once a value has been selected.
Default values for auto-complete fields are cleared on loading of the edit screen in some browsers.
A app\decibel\file\DFileExistsException can be thrown is two processes access an uncached theme resource at the same instant.
Available and default language information is not provided to child objects of when editing a new model instance.

The RPC router attempts to request authentication information from the client when a user has attempted to login using an un-confirmed account, even if the RPC is not itself requesting authentication.
Install script does not work on a server where only mysqli extension is installed and invalid database configuration inputs are applied.
app\decibel\controller\DPath does not catch app\decibel\model\debug\DInvalidFieldValueException and consider path invalid in this case.
app\decibel\rpc\DCurlRequest references invalid method app\decibel\rpc\DCurlRequestAuditOptions::getLogSuccessful().
app\decibel\asset\DSvgDecoder::decode() throws an exception if an invalid source filename is provided.
Search index records are not removed when searchable content is expired.
User is redirected to default language version of a page when logging in on another language version.
Added the app\decibel\http\DSeeOtherRedirect to allow triggering of a 303 redirect.
The 'Created' field cannot be included in a model export.
Added the app\decibel\authorise\event\DOnPasswordChange event.
Added the app\decibel\http\DHttpResponse class and child classes which allow HTTP responses (such as errors and redirects) to be thrown and potentially caught by calling methods.
Added the app\decibel\rpc\DCurlRequest::setConnectTimeout() method to allow modification of the connection timeout on a cURL request.
Added the app\decibel\rpc\DRequest::isHttpsAvailable() method to confirm if this request could be served over the HTTPS protocol.
Added the app\decibel\router\DOnHttpResponse event which is triggered by the app\decibel\router\DRouterEventDispatcher before an HTTP response is sent to the client.
Added the app\decibel\ssl\DCertificateGetter class to retrieve SSL certificates from a host.
Added the app\decibel\stream\DStream class to provide stream read and write functionality.
Added the app\decibel\decorator\DDecorator class to provide a generic implementation of the Decorator pattern.
Changed the default connection timeout to 2 seconds for cURL requests.
Improved the HTTP response debug message to indicate the source of the response.
Dropped support for the PHP mysql extension. The mysqli extension is now required.
Improved output of the debug() function.
Fatal error triggered when app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch::getFields() is executed on a model with one or more fields of type app\decibel\model\field\DChildObjectsField.
Remote procedure router does not correctly handle redirects issued to the front end.
Extraneous joins are added to app\decibel\model\DBaseModelSearch generated SQL when one or more app\decibel\model\field\DOneToManyRelationalField conditions are added.
Hierarchical group names do not include parent group name.
General performance improvements.
Refactored the application bootstrap to improve load speed and memory usage.
Added CSRF tokens to the default login and password change and reset forms.
SVG image support is not enabled by default.
